They provide functional medicine Anthem services. How to tell if Naturopathy is right for me? A Anthem naturopath is a practitioner of naturopathy, a form of alternative medicine based on the idea that the body has an innate capacity to heal itself. Anthem Naturopaths improve health by treating the person holistically, tapping a person's own internal body, mind, and spirit resources.
